headline: Strengthen Your Passive Income Stream with High-Yielding REITs
summary: With all of the chaos in the markets, it’s a good idea to protect your portfolio and generate income with high-yielding stocks. Look at real estate investment trusts (REITs), for example. For one, most are a great hedge against inflation. After all, when inflation rises, so do a lot of rents. Two, we’re seeing a ... Strengthen Your Passive Income Stream with High-Yielding REITs
